metadata.title: Home Warehouse
metadata.description: Organize everything you own. Track items, locations, and loans across your home with a powerful inventory management system.

hero.badgeText: PWA with offline support now available
hero.subtitle: Track items, locations, and loans across your home with a powerful inventory management system. Know exactly what you have and where it is.

features.title: Everything you need to stay organized
features.subtitle: A complete inventory management system designed for homes, collections, and small businesses.

items.title: Item Catalog
items.description: Track items with SKU, brand, model, serial numbers, and custom categories. Full-text search across your inventory.

locations.title: Location Hierarchy
locations.description: Organize by rooms, zones, shelves, and bins. Create a complete map of your storage spaces.

containers.title: Containers
containers.description: Group items in boxes, drawers, and containers. Perfect for seasonal storage and moving.

workspaces.title: Multi-User Workspaces
workspaces.description: Collaborate with family or roommates. Role-based access control keeps everyone organized.

scanning.title: Barcode Scanning
scanning.description: Scan barcodes and QR codes with your phone. Generate labels for containers and locations.

loans.title: Loan Tracking
loans.description: Track who borrowed what and when it's due. Never lose track of lent items again.

alerts.title: Smart Alerts
alerts.description: Get notified about low stock, expiring items, warranty deadlines, and overdue loans.

import.title: Import & Export
import.description: Bulk import from CSV/Excel. Export your data anytime for backup or migration.

howItWorks.title: Get started in minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple setup process to get your inventory organized quickly.

step1.title: Create your workspace
step1.description: Sign up and create a workspace for your home, garage, or collection. Invite family members to collaborate.

step2.title: Add locations & items
step2.description: Set up your storage hierarchy and start adding items. Import from spreadsheets or scan barcodes.

step3.title: Find anything instantly
step3.description: Search across all your items and locations. Always know exactly where everything is stored.

cta.title: Ready to get organized?
cta.subtitle: Start tracking your inventory today. Free to use for personal projects, with premium features for power users.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your inventory and recent activity

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Organize items with hierarchical categories
categories.emptyDescription: Create your first category to organize items
categories.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
categories.deleteWarning: This will also delete all subcategories. Items in this category will become uncategorized.
categories.name: Name

outOfStock.title: Out of Stock
outOfStock.subtitle: Items that need restocking
outOfStock.emptyDescription: Great news! No items are currently out of stock.
outOfStock.name: Name

auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.signupDescription: Get started with your free account
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.agreeToTerms: By creating an account, you agree to our

footer.tagline: Organize everything you own with powerful inventory management.
footer.copyright: Â© {year} Home Warehouse. All rights reserved.

approvals.title: Approvals
approvals.subtitle: Review and approve pending changes
approvals.emptyDescription: There are no pending changes to review at this time.
approvals.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters.
approvals.noPermissionDescription: Only workspace owners and admins can view approvals.

requestInfo.title: Request Information
requestInfo.description: Details about who requested this change

payload.title: Change Details
payload.description: The data associated with this change request
payload.note: This shows the data that will be created, updated, or deleted.
payload.noData: No data available for this change.
payload.deleteConfirmation: This entity will be permanently deleted if approved.

approveDialog.title: Approve Change
approveDialog.description: Are you sure you want to approve this change? This action will apply the changes immediately and cannot be undone.

rejectDialog.title: Reject Change
rejectDialog.description: Please provide a reason for rejecting this change request.
rejectDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why this change is being rejected...

approvals.approveSuccessDescription: The change has been approved and applied successfully.

myChanges.title: My Changes
myChanges.subtitle: Track your submitted change requests
myChanges.emptyDescription: You haven't submitted any change requests yet.
myChanges.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters.
myChanges.pendingDescription: Your change is awaiting approval from an admin.
myChanges.approvedDescription: Your change has been approved and applied.
myChanges.rejectedDescription: Your change was rejected by an admin.

rejectionReasons.itemInUse: Item is currently in use and cannot be modified

toast.pendingDescription: Your change has been submitted and is awaiting approval from an admin.
toast.approvedDescription: Your change request has been approved and applied.
toast.submittedDescription: Your {action} request for {entityType} is pending admin approval.

banner.title: Pending Approval
banner.description: This change is awaiting approval from a workspace admin.

imports.title: Import Jobs
imports.subtitle: Manage and monitor your bulk import operations

empty.title: No import jobs
empty.description: You haven't created any import jobs yet. Click the button above to start a new import.

errors.authDescription: Please log in to access the import system.
errors.serverDescription: The server encountered an error. Please try again later.
errors.unavailableDescription: The import service is currently unavailable. This may happen if the background worker is not running.

upload.title: Upload Photos
upload.instructions: Drag and drop images here, or click to browse. You can upload multiple photos at once.
upload.dropZoneLabel: Photo upload drop zone. Click or press Enter to browse files.
upload.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (max 10MB each)
upload.selectedFiles: {count, plural, =1 {1 file selected} other {# files selected}}
upload.uploadSuccess: {count, plural, =1 {Photo uploaded successfully} other {# photos uploaded successfully}}
upload.someUploadsFailed: {count, plural, =1 {1 upload failed} other {# uploads failed}}
upload.tooManyFiles: Too many files. Maximum {max} files allowed.
upload.caption: Caption (optional)
upload.startingUpload: Starting upload of {count, plural, =1 {1 file} other {# files}}
upload.allUploadsComplete: {count, plural, =1 {1 photo uploaded} other {# photos uploaded}} successfully

gallery.emptyDescription: Upload photos to get started. You can add multiple photos and set captions.
gallery.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this photo? This action cannot be undone.

captionEditor.title: Edit Caption
captionEditor.description: Add or update the caption for this photo.
captionEditor.caption: Caption
captionEditor.placeholder: Enter a caption for this photo...
captionEditor.hint: Press Enter to save, Esc to cancel

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your workspace and account settings

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Backup and restore your workspace data
dataManagement.backupRestoreDescription: Export or import your workspace data

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.description: Receive alerts when you're not using the app

notSupported.title: Not Supported
notSupported.description: Push notifications are not supported in this browser. Try using Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.

denied.title: Permission Denied
denied.description: You've blocked notifications for this site. To enable, update your browser settings.

status.enabled: Push notifications are enabled on this device

pushNotifications.info: You'll receive notifications for loan reminders, approval decisions, and other important updates.

syncHistory.title: Sync History
syncHistory.subtitle: Review resolved conflicts from offline sync
syncHistory.emptyDescription: No conflicts have been recorded yet. Conflicts are logged when offline changes differ from server data.

repairs.title: Repair History
repairs.noRepairsDescription: Repair entries will appear here when added

declutter.title: Declutter Assistant
declutter.description: Identify unused items to reduce inventory clutter

emptyState.title: No unused items found
emptyState.description: All your inventory items have been used recently

offline.message: You're offline. Some features may be unavailable.

pendingUploads.queued: {count, plural, =1 {1 photo queued for upload} other {# photos queued for upload}}

banner.title: Install Home Warehouse
banner.description: Add to your home screen for quick access and offline support

ios.title: Install on iOS
ios.description: Follow these steps to add Home Warehouse to your home screen

step1.title: Tap the Share button
step1.description: Find the Share button in Safari's toolbar at the bottom of the screen

step2.title: Add to Home Screen
step2.description: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

step3.title: Confirm installation
step3.description: Tap "Add" in the top right corner to install the app
